column4: My SSH is suddenly being refused. I tryied alot of things of going into adding an SSH incoming accept rule in iptables. Doesn't seem to work. I've been thinking that it could be OpenSSH not running. Any ideas of fixing this? (I have server access)
lol no. It's not physically available.
it's a VPS. It's control panel gives some amount of access to the console. But I need to SSH in.
